mcq.statement: According to the Wavell Plan, who were the only non-Indian members proposed for the Viceroy's Executive Council?

options.c: Both the viceroy and the commander-in-chief

mcq.one_liner: The Wavell Plan stipulated that all members of the Viceroy's Executive Council would be Indians except for the viceroy and the commander-in-chief, who would remain British.
